name: Fantasy Forest (averyzg, danisipinontea, ajared02)
description:
Welcome ~

We are team Soot Sprites, consisting of members Avery, Dani, and Jared! We are excited to share our final project: a virtual world we have built to showcase our modeling and world-building skills from Art 107. Here you can watch a short walkthrough video below, or download the zip file so you can navigate through our fantasy forest!  Enjoy ~

Walkthrough & Description

After waking up in a cave during your camping trip, you wander into a magical fantasy forest, home to mythical creatures and vibrant greenery meant to be explored. See what wonders you will find!

Keyboard Controls

WASD | Walk 

WASD + Shift | Run

SPACE | Jump

CTRL | Crouch

ESC | Quit 

Credits

Music: Hilda and The Mountain King - Amma's Theme by Ryan Carlson

3rd Party Assets: Water Caustics Texture | Weathered Planks Texture | Stylize Water Texture | Branches 0038 Texture | Mist PNG | Forest Leaves 04 Texture | Forest Leaves 03 Texture | Fabric Leather 01 Texture | Book Pattern Texture | Bark Willow Texture | Rock Boulder Dry Texture
